p: In silico analysis was performed to identify potential transcription factors that bind the regions spanning the six Slc27a3 CpG sites investigated in this study. The Slc27a3 gene sequence containing the CpG island of interest was obtained from the UCSC Genome Browser ( https://genome.ucsc.edu/- Rat 5.0/rn5 assembly, accessed May 2020). The transcription factor prediction software PROMO [ 17] was used to identify the putative transcription factors within this region.
